# CAM::STOP_GAMEPLAY_HINT

## Summary
Stops the hint cam running except if its a code gameplay hint

## Parameters
* **BOOL** stopImmediately = false: If TRUE, the hint camera will stop immediately, otherwise it will enter its release phase.
